name: usgrpredgv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)), wcel(c0, cumgr))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ USGraph, { c1, c2 } ∈ c3, (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4), c0 ∈ UMGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ { c1, c2 } ∈ c3)→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4))
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c2 } ∈ c3)→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ { c1, c2 } ∈ c3)→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4))
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ UMGraph ∧ { c1, c2 } ∈ c3)→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c2 ∈ c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c4)))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cedg, c0))

comment: An edge of a simple graph always connects two vertices. Analogue of ~ usgredgprv . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)
